about_the_game:
Embark on a journey into a realm where malevolent creatures have broken free from the depths of hell. Visions of Evil invites you to a 4v1 PvP horror experience, pitting players against a relentless Evil.

As a Purger, you’ll arm yourself with various ancient weapons and artifacts bestowed by the Devil himself in order to return the Evil to where it came from. But make sure to keep the lights on or you will face the Evil's true form.

If that doesn’t pique your interest, try leveraging the powers of malevolent creatures to teach the invaders what true horror looks like. Each of them with their own abilities and advantages.

Visions of Evil also features a unique progression and customization system for both sides allowing you to tailor your own gameplay.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content
